text: The McCoys were a rock group formed in Fort Recovery, Ohio, United States, in 1962. They are best known for their 1965 hit single "Hang On Sloopy". They were originally named Rick and the Raiders, they changed their name to "The McCoys". ==Albums== Year Album Billboard 200 Record label 1965 Hang On Sloopy 44 Bang Records 1966 You Make Me Feel So Good — 1968 Infinite McCoys — Mercury Records 1969 Human Ball — 1976 Glass Derringer — LA International "—" denotes releases that did not chart. ==References== ==Other websites== * Classic Bands: The McCoys * Category:Musicians from Ohio Category:American pop rock bands
title: The McCoys
